GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
i2c: Fix a potential use after free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 81cb31756888bb062e92d2dca21cd629d77a46a9, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 611e12ea0f121a31d9e9c4ce2a18a77abc2f28d6. For more details please see the references link.
